animeTitle: Sensei no Ojikan: Doki Doki School Hours OVA
otherNames: Sensei no Ojikan: Doki Doki School Hours Episodes 14-20, せんせいのお時間: Doki Doki School Hours
synopsis: The series is centered on 27-year-old homeroom teacher Mika Suzuki (who only looks about half her age) and the eccentric and colorful students of her class.
